Package nl.naturalis.oaipmh.rest

REST application classes and classes mediating between the REST layer and the OAI repository.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JAXRS
    JAX-RS framework plumbing class.
    OAIPMHResource
    REST resource handling all OAI-PMH requests for all OAI repositories.
    OAIPMHStream
    Implementation of StreamingOutput targeted at streaming the OAI-PMH coming back from an OAI repository.
    Registry
    Class responsible for configuring the REST service.
    RepositoryFactory
    Factory class producing IOAIRepository instances.
    RequestBuilder
    Builds OAIPMHRequest objects from HTTP URLs.
    RESTUtil
    Provides common functionality for the REST service.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ApplicationInitializationException
    Exception thrown if anything goes wrong while configuring and initializing the REST service.
    RepositoryInitializationException
    Exception thrown if anything goes wrong while configuring and initializing an OAI repository.

Package nl.naturalis.oaipmh.rest Description

REST application classes and classes mediating between the REST layer and the OAI repository.
Author:
Ayco Holleman
